definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Keep a rosemary plant in your office.
sentences.chinese: 在辦公室養一盆迷迭香。

sentences.english: When the grill is ready, toss the rosemary sprigs directly on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 當烤架準備好，直接將迷迭香灑在火上。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE Progress in recent pharmacological studies of Rosmarinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討迷迭香酸藥理研究近況。

sentences.english: There was rosemary behind me, and I could smell only the scent of its alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 我身後有迷迭香，我只能聞見它散發出的酒精氣味。

sentences.english: Geralt first meets him outside the Rosemary and Thyme.
sentences.chinese: 傑洛特首次遇見他是在迷迭香和百里香外面。

sentences.english: Rosemary is a culinary herb as well as essential oil.
sentences.chinese: 迷迭香是一種烹飪用藥草，也用於精油。

sentences.english: The herbal complex of Lemon &Cedarwood balance oil production and restore vitality.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬和迷迭香平衡油脂分泌，使其恢復生命力。

sentences.english: I have some lavender, rosemary, and different ferns and mosses at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我種了薰衣草，迷迭香，幾種蕨類植物和苔蘚。

sentences.english: One of the most famous memory-enhancing herbs is rosemary.
sentences.chinese: 最著名的提高記憶力的草本植物之一是迷迭香。

sentences.english: A reliable and stable method is established to determine the content of total phenolic acids of rosemary by Folin-Ciocalteu colorimetry.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一種可靠穩定的迷迭香總酚酸含量的檢測方法。

sentences.english: The printed Cola on this T-shirt reminded me about a song of Jay Chou.
sentences.chinese: 恤上印着可樂的圖，令我想起了周董的“迷迭香”。

sentences.english: And sweet-smelling rosemary plants are hung on doors or cut to look like little Christmas trees.
sentences.chinese: 芳香的迷迭香被掛在門上或者修剪成小聖誕樹的形狀。

sentences.english: TBHQ and rosmarinic acid had synergetic antioxidant effect.
sentences.chinese: TBHQ對迷迭香酸具有一定的協同抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Seared lamb fillet with a mint and rosemary crust.
sentences.chinese: 搭配羔羊肉片佐以薄荷或迷迭香十分美味。

sentences.english: It has better effect to use with Rosemary Aromatic Smoothening & Dandruff Removing Shampoo.
sentences.chinese: 與迷迭香柔順祛屑洗髮乳配合使用效果更佳。
蕪荽，鼠尾草，迷迭香和百里香。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
